website_summaries.verdict: The Yurbuds Leap Wireless Bluetooth earphones are good-sounding, secure-fitting earphones designed for intense exercise.
pros: Powerful audio performance with bright highs and decent bass response
Incredibly secure fit and washable, removable eartips are exercise-friendly
cons: Not for those seeking booming bass response

customer_reviews.title: Look funny but definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: So they stick out quite a bit from my ears and they look a little funny. Other than that, they work perfectly fine. The on and off button sometimes takes a couple tries but worth the money I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they're great. But they only seem to charge and work ...
customer_reviews.text: When they work, they're great. But they only seem to charge and work correctly about 70% of the time. I like the yurbuds because of the ear fit, but I don't like the uncertainty of their reliability when I get to the gym. It's irritating when they've been plugged into the charger overnight and at then won't work the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: J Elektra

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for the money. Sure, the part that sticks out from your ear is a little Lego-like, but it's more discrete than a lot of others I see folks at the gym wearing. The battery life is not long, so you will have to charge them after every use. And honestly the only thing I have to complain about is that the beep in your ear is really loud when turning the volume up or down, pausing or anything of that nature.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: These are really good. Only con I would give is the power ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably aren't for everyone, but I struggle with the typical styles falling out of my ears. These are really good. Only con I would give is the power switch, both on and off--has to be pushed just right.
customer_reviews.author: M.G

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy
customer_reviews.text: Sound fine and I'm a big fan of Yurbuds but the way these are designed is such that they are a little to heavy for the Yurbud to work. They tend to fall out if I'm running or jumping rope. Walking around they are fin. The chord is a little stiff
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P. Kilinski

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones - Died after one year
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Quality sound, comfortable fit, secure fit, reasonable bluetooth range, reasonable battery life, easy to use, affordable price, attractive design, easy to store/pack/carry. Cons: Died after one year. seriously.... not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in under a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few weeks then power themselves off and will not power back on, waiting for email customer service was supposed to send for relacement
customer_reviews.author: travis bosich

customer_reviews.title: Love em! They dont fall out of my ears ...
customer_reviews.text: Love em! They dont fall out of my ears when I run and they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I have the wired Yurbuds and loved it. Was not happy with the wireless version. Kept losing bluetooth connection (which was frustrating); range is not very far and doesn't seem to hold that long of a charge. Plus the USB cable didn't seem to fit right. I waited too long to return, so I ended up donating it and went with something else
customer_reviews.author: Sachie Nackenhorst

customer_reviews.title: ... "guaranteed not to fall out" and they fall out pretty easily. These are not as good as the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are suppose to be "guaranteed not to fall out" and they fall out pretty easily. These are not as good as the "wired" Yurbuds. Pretty disappointed in these. The only good thing is that the sound is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I thought maybe is the charger no good. So I ordered another pair
customer_reviews.text: I don’t what happened it’s not working. I thought maybe is the charger no good. So I ordered another pair. But it’s same thing again. Every time I saw my two pair. I very want to send it’s back for this products company!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They stop connecting to my phone & lap top after 2 weeks. Returning them
customer_reviews.author: nikita777

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love my wired paired of Yurbuds, but this pair has been a complete disappointment. Bluetooth stopped working and the range was horrible when they did work. A Father's day present from my kids that lasted for about two months. Contacted customer service and hope to hear a response back.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Swank

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with stability.
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with every type of headphones except Yurbuds. These stay in place really well when I am working out or working in the yard. There have been a couple times running when I had to adjust one side, but not very often.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Coursey

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after couple times of use and they look like Lego block sticking out of ear. Not quality that YurBuds had prior.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: BAD HEADPHONES! SAVE YOURSELF THE HASSLE
customer_reviews.text: Headphones worked for 20 seconds out of the box and then stopped. Won't hold charge and clearly a lemon. Now I get the joy of repacking and sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they were great but stoped working after less then a year
customer_reviews.text: they were great but stoped working after less then a year. simply would not come on. i got no help fro customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Norma R.

customer_reviews.title: but not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: They fit really well and the sound is alright. It fades in and out sometimes, but not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Once we figured out how to pair them, they worked fantastically well.
customer_reviews.author: Hartland family

customer_reviews.title: Love these. My ears are small and I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. My ears are small and I can change out the buds to a smaller size. Stay put while running, easy to use and great sound.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Fit was great after I put on the bigger size. Great for running and battery life lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds were too big and didn'the sync with an android.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & sound!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, who did NOT want wireless earbuds since he has always used the old school headphones. Told him to try them and if he didn't like I could return them but he ended up LOVING them! :) They fit him perfect and blocked out all outside sounds!
customer_reviews.author: Cannabiased

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Find another product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Worst purchase of the year. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY. The earpieces are made for a full grown sasquatch. They absolutely will not stay in my ear, they leave my ear sore and the design is quite flawed. In order to fit in both ears the cord must rotate slightly, allowing the other earpiece to fall out. The power button sucks too.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Senior

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and work well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and work well, but the button/control design leaves a little to be desired. Pushing on the center of the button to turn the thing on and off can be frustrating for some people. Some folks may find that the buds don't seat firmly and may find that they pop out during activity/movement.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Good overall. The Next Track button is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Good overall. The Next Track button is a bit difficult with android and spotify so be aware. You'll need to be careful otherwise you'll skip a few tracks if you hold onto the button just a tiny bit too long.
customer_reviews.author: Halcyon

customer_reviews.title: False review and advt
customer_reviews.text: Worst Bluetooth set ever. It was supposed to hold on to the ears for even extreme workouts. I can't even hold them properly while walking
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed, I had one of these before I deployed ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed, I had one of these before I deployed and I had no issues. The one that was recently sent to me does not hold a charge very long and now it won't work unless it's plugged in to the charger. Extremely disappointed since the first one I had was awesome and I got a cruddy one now. Refund??? Replacement???
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Gottschall

customer_reviews.title: ... linking to my devise they come on but don't like to my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: There not linking to my devise they come on but don't like to my iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never fall out. Comfortable. Sound is mediocre. Price is good for the durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after trying the wired version that NEVER slip out of my ears. These stay put just as well. The cable connecting the two ear buds is tough and just the right length so it doesn't need to be cinched like other brands. The sound quality is not wonderful but, for the price, I am not expecting top of the line sound. I wish they made a higher end model or another company made buds wth these ear connectors. Really these are simply worth it for the fit in the ear, which they seem to have cornered the market on, somehow. Buy them for great workout headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Greg G

customer_reviews.title: Don't even try
customer_reviews.text: No matter what they say. These headphones keep falling from my ears...
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius Costa

customer_reviews.title: Crap. Would no longer power up
customer_reviews.text: Broke after second use. Crap. Would no longer power up. Bought a set of power beats and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of annoying, but decent
customer_reviews.text: These don't stay in very well. They used to fit very well, but they got slippery after only a few weeks. Now I have to mess with them to get them to stay, and they're still not very comfortable. It's also kind of hard to hear unless you get them in just right. The sound quality is also not great. But for the most part, they work pretty well if those things don't bother you.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Ault

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bad fit and stupid looking on your head anyway...thumbs downnnnnn. I'd give these no stars if Amazon would let me.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Harris

product_meta.title: Yurbuds (CE) Leap for Women In-Ear Wireless Headphones, Aqua
product_meta.description:
yurbuds® LEAP Wireless For Women in-the-ear secure fit earphones feature our signature ergonomic design, made to comfortably fit smaller ears while delivering exceptional sound. With no wires, 6+ hour battery life, easy music control and simple Bluetooth connectivity, discover the bright side of wireless.

FlexSoft®

Guaranteed never to hurt, yurbuds® are ergonomically designed to avoid nerve rich areas of the ear for long-lasting comfort. Made with medical-grade, flexible silicone, they are ultra soft and comfortable for hours on end.


Allows Ambient Sound

yurbuds® are ergonomically designed to allow in ambient noise so you’re aware of your surroundings during active use.


Sweat Proof

Developed for training in any conditions, yurbuds® endure through rain, water, and sweat.


TwistLock® Technology

Exclusive to yurbuds®, our patented TwistLock® Technology provides a secure fit that is guaranteed never to fall out even during the most rigorous physical activities.


Specially Designed for Smaller Ears

yurbuds® researched, sized and shaped our female line specifically for women's ears.


Smart Battery

Our battery life is tested and proven to powers a week’s worth of workouts. Track the battery life with on-screen and audible indicators.


Woven Cords

For increased durability and portability, the woven cords are both tangle and tear resistant.
feature_bullets: The three button inline remote doesn't interrupt your workout or training session when you need to take a call
Sweat and moisture won't hold you back from your goals, and it should not affect your headphones
Twist Lock Technology keeps your headphones secured with a simple twist; Once in place, the earbuds are 'Locked' into place and won't wrangle free even during the most strenuous of exercises
